title: BloodyMary
body:
Amma is the 13-year-old queen bee of Wind Gap.
She is crazy about her doll house and her mom.
The best way to handle a mean girl is to make them feel special and do everything they say.
If she asks you to play with her, you should do it.

title: Amma
body:
Hello!
Sorry I'm not looking at you, but I prefer to give my attention to those who can make me a star. <<Ammacurtsy>>
You understand right?
[[ yes |Yay ]] [[ no |Oh ]]

title: Yay
body:
I knew I would like you.<<normal>> 
What's your name? 
Never mind it doesn't matter
Mine is Amma. I'm 13, but my mom treats me like I'm 3 and boys treat me like I'm 30.
I don't normally dress like this. My mother dresses me when I'm at home.
She likes me to look little, but on the streets I look very adult.
Do you think I'm beautiful? Everybody else does.
[[ yes |Good ]] [[ no |What ]]

title: Oh
body:
Well, that sucks for you.<<madamma>>
What's your name anyway?
Mine is Amma. I'm thirteen, but my mom treats me like I'm three and boys treat me like I'm thirty.
I don't normally dress like this. My mother dresses me when I'm home.
She likes me to look little, but on the streets I look very adult. 
Do you think I'm beautiful? Everybody else does. 
[[ yes |Good ]] [[ no |What ]]

title: What
body:
Well, your super weird and mean. <<madamma>>
No ones going to like you here unless I do. My mother says I'm the most popular girl in the whole town.
She's a very important person ya know.
She adores me, especially when I'm sick. That's why I drink lots of her special medicine.
I like being sick because she is constantly at my side. I'm her little doll.
Hey, do you think my mother is the best mother in the whole world?
[[ yes |Interesting ]] [[ no |Huh ]]

title: Good
body:
Ya I get an A+ in that department. There is definitely hope for you. <<normal>>
I want to get to know you better first though.
My mom is the closest person to me in the world. She's a very Important person ya know.
She pays the most attention to me when I am sick.
That's why I drink lots of her special medicine. 
I'm her little doll.
Hey, do you think my mother is the best mother in the whole world?
[[ yes |Interesting ]] [[ no |Huh ]]

title: Interesting
body:
Interesting, you must be one of her students. She teaches piano to some of the weird girls in town. <<madamma>>
Well, she did before they went missing.
Don't worry they turned back up. Well, parts of them didn't...
Hey smile at me with teeth...
Oh you have a beautiful smile and really nice hair. 
I have this incredible doll house with ivory floor and handmade rugs.
<<lay>>
Do you want to come play? 
[[ yes |Great]] [[ no |Fine ]]

title: Huh
body:
Well, you've never even met her. You should probably get out of here. 
<<normal>>
I'm really busy. 
I have to make sure I play with all the little girls hoarding around my mother.
<<lay>>
Get out of here...Unless, you want to play too? 
[[ yes |Great]] [[ no |Fine]]

title: Great
body:
Great! Smile at me with your teeth. 
I have the most amazing doll house with an amazing ivory floor that is almost finished...

title: Fine
body:
Your not very pretty anyway. <<normal>>
You'll ruin my doll house. <<add>>
Bye. I'm sure you'll miss me...

title: Housedoor
body:
Oh you want to go inside to visit my mother?
[[ yes | ]] [[ no | ]]
